info.text: Drops 10 beams of light every 15 seconds
Stops the effect for 20 seconds every time Isaac takes damage (except self-inflicted damage)
Deals 10% of the damage dealt to enemies to all enemies in the room
After taking damage, all additional damage in the room is reduced to 1/2 heart
Grants a repelling aura that pushes away enemies and projectiles for 1 minute every 2 minutes
Spawns the Magician? tarot card in the starting room of the next run
Grants poison tears
Chance to spawn a friendly poison fly on hit
Chance increases with luck
Increases chance of finding devil rooms, angel rooms, and planetariums
Krampus cannot spawn in devil rooms
Devil rooms are replaced with special variants
Planetariums can spawn in The Womb and Corpse
Consuming any stat down pill will also grant a permanent damage up
Consuming most other pill types will also spawn a black heart
Negates damage and grants invincibility for 10 seconds when Isaac takes damage
Has a 60 second cooldown after activation
Isaac can break most obstacles by walking over them, and a stack is gained for every 10 rocks broken
Double-tap any attack button to deal damage to enemies within the attack direction based on the number of accumulated stacks, using a yell and shockwaves
50% chance for enemies to be petrified when entering a room
Killing a petrified enemy freezes them
Grants Leo at the beginning of the next run
When moving fast enough, running into enemies will deal contact damage to the enemy and prevent contact damage dealt to Isaac
Gain a speed up, tears up, damage up, or Telepathy for Dummies effect upon entering a boss room
Grants a dash attack that can be activated by double-tapping a move button
Isaac is immune to most damage instead of firing tears while charging, and deals contact damage that scales with his tear damage
Freezes all enemies while charging for up to 30 seconds
The freeze effect ends early if Isaac fires a tear
Leaves a trail of creep that deals 66% of Isaac's damage and copies his tear effects
Tears burst from enemies on hit
Stops the effect for 10 seconds every time Isaac takes damage (except self-inflicted damage)
Spawns a random golden trinket and Gulp on pickup
Spawns 1 random golden trinket in the starting room of the next run
Spawns 14 Dead Birds every 10 seconds
Spawns Soul of Eve in the starting room of the next run
Reduces Mega Satan's health slightly
Reduces the health of all enemies except Mega Satan
Drops Cracked Key on pickup
Spawns 1 Cracked Key in the starting room of the next run
Reveals the location of ultra secret rooms on the map
Increased knockback
Fires 2 tears at a time
Tears travel in a wave-like pattern
Chance to fire tears that instantly kills normal monsters
Chance increases with luck
Familiar that chases enemies, blocks enemy shots, and deals heavy contact damage over time
Drops a Black Mirror on pickup
Upon entering each room, creates a duplicate of each of Isaac's familiars
Astro-rules only
Teleports to the I AM ERROR room of the Ultra Greedier
Removes Pyromaniac and Host Hat if held
x1.25 damage multiplier
Isaac is always affected by Curse of Darkness
Spawns 2 angel room items in addition to boss room rewards, which disappear when one is picked up
Single use
Slightly increases tears and damage every time a room is cleared
25% chance for tears to gain a holy aura that deals 60 damage per second
Drops Missing Poster on pickup
Spawns Blanket in the starting room of the next run
Burning Basement, Flooded Caves, Dank Depths, and Scarred Womb floors will not appear in the next run
Deals extra damage to enemies that appear on floors that are not generated
Spawns Satchel, Belly Button, and Polydactyly on pickup. Picking up one makes the other 2 disappear
Spawns 1 Ansuz in the starting room of the next run
x1.25 damage multiplier
50% chance for homing tears
Unlocks range limit in QuickPick mod
Removes all held planetarium items and spawns as many planetarium items as removed on pickup
Small tears orbit tears dealing x0.5 Isaac's damage
Absorbs all pedestal items in the room and grants random stat ups for each absorbed
Turns all pickups in the room into blue flies and spiders
Deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room
Astro-rules only
Teleports home
Slightly increases the item quality of future pedestal items
Removes held the Mind/Body/Soul upon defeating a boss
Spawns 1 held item and one of the Mind/Body/Soul upon starting a new floor. Picking up one makes the other disappear
Chance to inflict bleed on all enemies upon entering a room
Chance increases with luck
Chance to spawn a beam of light on hit that damages enemies
Chance increases with luck
Slows all enemies for 8 seconds upon entering a room
Grants damage ups for each revival item held
Spawns 1 random revival item in the starting room of the next run
Chance to fire booger tears that stick to enemies
Chance increases with luck
Teleports to a planetarium with a glitch machine and spawns Telescope Lens
Single use
Removes all held tear replacement items
Damage increases with luck
Deals extra damage to bosses
Reveals random rooms on the map
Number of revealed rooms increases with luck
Deals 10% of the damage dealt to enemies to all enemies in the room except bosses
Spawns a black hole at the location of the first enemy killed during combat
Grants invincibility for 10 seconds upon clearing a room
Rerolls all items, trinkets, and pickups in the room
Items are rerolled from random pools
Removes 1 held item and spawns the removed item and one of Orbs upon starting a new floor. Picking up one makes the other disappear
Piercing tears
Tears that pierce through at least 1 enemy gain homing
Enemies take extra damage that increases with luck
Grants Cupid's Arrow at the beginning of the next run
Grants Treasure Map and Purple Candle effects for the activated room and the next room
Grants a random stat up every 9 rooms cleared
Chance for an extra chest to spawn when a normal chest appears
Grants a random stat up up to 10 times every time a room is cleared
Extra stats reset upon starting a new floor
Grants a small damage up for each key held
Grants a small damage up for each bomb held
Chance to spawn an item from the room's pool, or gain 3 broken hearts if failed
Chance increases with luck
Single use
Replaces all pills with horse pills
Identifies pills before using them
Replaces most pill effects with PHD and stat-related effects
Reveals the central 5x5 rooms of the floor on the map while held
Turns hidden enemies into friendly ones
Stacks accumulate with chance every time a room is cleared
Chance increases with luck
Spawns tear replacement items equal to accumulated stacks in non-secret rooms. Spawned items disappear upon leaving the room, and picking up one makes the others disappear
Single use
Removes 1 held item and spawns the removed item and Succubus upon starting a new floor. Picking up one makes the other disappear
Disappears if holding 4 or more Succubus
50% chance to replace low-quality pedestal items with essence items
Doubles the effects of essence items
Astro-rules only
Reduces all stats slightly instead of taking damage before chapter 4 (except self-inflicted damage)
Spawns 3 treasure room pool items on pickup. Picking up one makes the other 2 disappear
New pedestal items cycle between two different items, allowing choice of one
Prevents damage stat from being lowered for the remainder of the run
Prevents tears stat from being lowered for the remainder of the run
Prevents luck stat from being lowered for the remainder of the run
Chance to spawn a Purgatory ghost on hit
Chance increases with luck
Chance to spawn various types of ghosts on hit
Chance increases with luck
Chance to fire seed tears that stick to enemies and explode after 2 seconds dealing large damage
Chance increases with luck
Doubles the number of blue flies spawned
Drops Locust of Conquest on pickup
Spawns a blue fly at the location of killed enemies
Grants +1 extra damage up to +5 for each charge of the active item upon activation
Removes all items that do not practically help the Lost from all pools
Gain 1 health, soul heart, or black heart
Multiplies all stats up or down
Chance to fire a 12-way beam on hit that damages enemies
Chance increases with luck
-2 luck
Drops Black Mirror
Fully charges upon starting a floor
Absorbs and stores up to 2 enemy souls upon killing enemies
Consumes souls to ignore cooldowns of sin items and spawn various types of ghosts upon activation
Chance for tears to gain a laser ring
Chance increases with luck
Astro-rules only
Chapter 4 health limit applies up to 6 hearts only
Removes defense and map-related items from all pools
Reveals the location of the first floor super secret room on the map
Spawns 3 high-quality held items. Spawned items disappear upon leaving the room, and picking up one makes the others disappear
Cannot be activated if no items are held or not in a super secret room
Single use
Removes 1 held item and spawns the removed item and 2 bedroom items. Picking up one makes the others disappear
Fully charges upon starting a floor
Spawns one item each from treasure, angel, and secret pools. Picking up one makes the other 2 disappear
Makes temporary effects from book items permanent
+2 speed in cleared rooms
-0.3 speed in uncleared rooms
Deals 10% of the damage dealt to enemies to all enemies in the room while held
Absorbs and stores up to 50 enemy souls upon killing enemies
Deals extra damage on hit for each stored soul
Stored souls decrease by 5 upon clearing a room
Grants Yo Listen! effect while held
Absorbs and stores up to 50 enemy souls upon killing enemies
Deals extra damage on hit for each stored soul
Stored souls decrease by 5 upon clearing a room
Grants Hungry Soul, Purgatory, and Ghost Bombs effects
Doubles the speed of spawned ghosts
Gain a Meat Cleaver upon starting a new floor
Isaac awakens for 3 seconds upon activation with chance for increased tears, slightly decreased speed, and slight screen and sound distortion
During awakening, slows game speed, grants flight and spectral tears, and negates one hit
Moves active item to consumable slot with number 8 key
Single use
No prediction allowed.
Counts as 3 items for Siamese Twins transformation
Rerolls all pedestal items in the room to the next item ID
Drops Candle or Red Candle
Single use
Speed increases by +0.3 up to the diagonal direction Isaac is moving
Rerolls all pedestal items in the room to one of held items
Items are rerolled to higher quality
Consume 10 coins and gain 2 of the following options:
Damage +1%~+50%
Boss damage +1%~+50%
Normal monster damage +1%~+50%
Consume 5 coins and gain 2 of the following options:
Damage +1%~+25%
Boss damage +1%~+25%
Normal monster damage +1%~+25%
Changes current character to Diabellstar
Single use
Damage increases slightly every second
Does not increase in starting rooms
Resets every time Isaac takes damage for 1 minute
Speed increases slightly every second
Does not increase in starting rooms
Resets every time Isaac takes damage for 1 minute
Tears increases slightly every second
Does not increase in starting rooms
Resets every time Isaac takes damage for 1 minute
Luck increases slightly every second
Does not increase in starting rooms
Resets every time Isaac takes damage for 1 minute
Rerolls all pedestal items in the room into essence items
Swift Essence does not appear if speed is at maximum
Reveals the boss room on the map
Automatically activates all the following effects upon defeating the floor's boss:
Activates The Sun tarot card effect
Fully charges Isaac's active item and grants Dogma
Drops 1 random trinket
Removes the floor's curse and increases damage and luck until the floor ends
Adds 1 secret room and 1 super secret room per floor
Reveals and opens all secret room entrances
Creates lights in secret and super secret rooms. Walking into the light grants half soul heart and tears up until the floor ends
Reveals locations of secret, super secret, and ultra secret rooms on the map
Most doors in rooms with enemies are open
Does not affect boss room doors or doors requiring keys
50% chance to activate Soul of Cain upon clearing a room
Charms nearby enemies
Charmed enemies take 1.5x damage
Destroys all spiked rocks and blooms flowers on all rocks in the room upon entering
Bloomed rocks are automatically destroyed upon clearing the room
Grants a chargeable dash attack activated by double-tapping movement keys
Isaac ignores most damage during dash and deals contact damage proportional to tear damage
Creates a small ring of flames that deals damage and burns upon colliding during dash
Grants Bible effect and Seraphim familiar for 30 seconds on pickup
Speed increases up to +0.3 while standing still, consumed upon moving to create poison cloud that grants damage and tears ups while standing in it
Grants immunity to poison gas created by enemies and farts that repel, damage, and poison enemies upon taking damage
Takes non-health-consuming damage every 5 seconds and becomes briefly invincible, triggering on-hit effects
Grants a wide halo with 7 orbiting tears upon starting a new room
Chance for enemy projectiles entering the halo to be absorbed into the orbiting path and damage enemies
Creates a ring every 10 seconds that repels enemies and captures projectiles
Ring disappears after 3 seconds and reflects all captured projectiles outward
Ice tears that slow enemies
Killing enemies with ice tears freezes them, and pushing to shatter fires an ice tear ring
Grants a cold aura that slows entering enemies
Quickly charges tears while not firing for burst fire
Firing consumes tears gradually up to 3 seconds
Grants +0.05 tears up every time a room is cleared
Extra stats reset upon starting a new floor
Isaac's size decreases greatly
Shrinks all enemies in the room for 5 seconds upon entering, allowing them to be crushed
-1 luck
Spawns 1 held item and 1 high-quality item. Picking up one makes the other disappear
Reveals the location of the first floor super secret room on the map
Fully charges upon starting a floor
Spawns one item from the room's pool on each empty pedestal in the room
Rerolls all pedestal items in the room to items from the room's pool
Items are rerolled to higher quality
Rerolls all pedestal items in the room to passive items from the room's pool
Spawns a golden trinket
Increases one of speed, tears, damage, or range by +0.05 every time a chest is opened
40% chance to spawn a small chest when opening a normal chest
Creates a ring that repels enemies and captures projectiles for 3 seconds upon killing the first enemy during combat
Ring disappears after 3 seconds and reflects all captured projectiles outward
Grants very high but decreasing tears up over time
Duration slightly extends every time an enemy is killed while the effect is active
Grants very high but decreasing luck up over time
Duration slightly extends every time an enemy is killed while the effect is active
Grants very high but decreasing speed up over time
Duration slightly extends every time an enemy is killed while the effect is active
Erases one random enemy upon entering a room with enemies, preventing that enemy from appearing again until the run ends
Activates up to 2 times per floor
Gain 1 health, soul heart, or black heart
Multiplies all stats up
Enhances all star items in the room
Single use
Spawns ghost tears orbiting enemies on hit, which fly toward the enemy after enough hits
Changes the room's color to red, green, or blue upon entering, granting Isaac extra stats based on color
Red - x1.4 damage multiplier
Green - x1.5 luck multiplier
Blue - x1.2 tears multiplier
Chance to fire tears that transform enemies into fetuses
Chance increases with luck
Fetuses last for a few seconds and deal rapid contact damage targeting enemies
Spawns a random ghost every 5 seconds
Creates a black hole at the center for 10 seconds upon activation that pulls in pickups and enemies, destroys obstacles around
Charges gradually with damage dealt, gaining 1 charge every 60 damage
Familiar that allows picking up Holy Mantle again once per floor when dropped due to hit
Familiar that spawns a Little Steven familiar up to 5 times with low chance every time tears are fired
Chance increases with luck
Familiar that drops a lil battery with 20% chance upon clearing a room
Rerolls each pedestal item in the room to 1-3 ahead or 1-3 behind item ID
Fires 4-way extra homing tears dealing half damage every time tears are fired
Spawns a tick that lasts for 2.7 seconds on hit
Ticks deal rapid sustained damage x2 tear damage and track to the nearest highest-health enemy
Always applies Whore of Babylon and Dead Bird effects
Doubles extra soul hearts
25% chance not to consume coins when using slot machines
Replaces shell game beggars with crane games
Isaac explodes every 4 seconds (immunity to explosion damage)
Negates the first damage taken per room
Disappears upon taking damage except self-damage
Boss room rewards are fixed to Little Steven
Disappears if holding 4 or more Little Stevens
Spawns 3 Abyss locusts upon entering a room with enemies
Rerolls Isaac's stats and all acquired items on pickup
Effect reactivates upon starting a new floor
Grants Birthright upon activation
Grants immunity to curses and negative effects of certain items
Identifies blinded items
Automatically extinguishes purple fires upon entering a room
Increases chance for devil or angel rooms to appear
Homing tears
Tears gain a holy aura dealing 30% tear damage per second
Homing tears
x2.3 damage multiplier
Enemies take damage at 2.3x the amount
Consume 5 coins and gain 2 of the following options separately from other cubes:
Damage +1%~+25%
Boss damage +1%~+25%
Normal monster damage +1%~+25%
Counts as 1 item for Guppy transformation with 50% chance upon starting a floor
Effect resets upon starting a new floor
Obtained with Schrodinger's Cat effect.
Disappears upon starting a new floor
Prevents stats from falling below Isaac's base stats in this run
Consumes to teleport to a special floor consisting of rooms holding all obtainable mid-quality pedestal items in the game
Picking up 1 pedestal item teleports Isaac back to the location where Death Certificate was used
Increases the item quality of future pedestal items
Consumes to teleport to a special floor consisting of rooms holding all ultra secret room pool items in the game
Picking up 1 pedestal item teleports Isaac back to the location where Death Certificate was used
Rerolls all pedestal items in the room to one of any transformation items
Gain a Lump of Band upon starting a new floor
Consumes to teleport to a special floor consisting of rooms holding all held items
Picking up 1 pedestal item teleports Isaac back to the location where Death Certificate was used
Holding bomb button while placing a bomb throws it in the Isaac's direction like a rocket instead
Place normal stationary bombs without holding the shoot button
Drops 10 giga bombs on pickup
Drops sticky nickels that disappear after 10 seconds on hit while held
Turns spawned sticky nickels into lit bombs upon activation
Grants an additional charged attack that creates a black ring around Isaac when released
The ring deals rapid damage to enemies in contact with it
Doubles coins, bombs, keys, and red hearts
Spawns a star with a bright aura at the center that slowly heads straight to the boss room
Standing in the aura grants homing tears and greatly increased damage and tears
Star only spawns in rooms with enemies and disappears upon clearing the room
Creates a ladder to the next floor
Creates a special extra shop when used on floor decorations
Creates a large long-lasting yellow creep in rooms with enemies every 15 seconds
Creates small yellow creep that deals sustained damage upon killing enemies
Removes food items from all pools
Marks a random enemy with a skull mark and another with a brimstone mark upon entering a room
Killing the skull-marked enemy first moves the skull mark to another enemy
Killing in marked order grants pickups or permanent stat ups to Isaac
Killing out of order removes the skull mark and no extra rewards
Brimstone-marked enemy takes increased damage from Brimstone attacks for 1 minute
Damage increases up to x1.5 gradually while sustaining fire in the same direction
Extra damage resets upon stopping fire or changing direction
Drops XIX - The Sun on first activation
Burns one enemy in the room upon activation
Chance to spawn a flame projectile at killed enemies' location while held
Chance increases with luck
Burning Basement floors will not appear in the next run
Drops XVIII - The Moon on first activation
Darkens the room and creates a light at the center upon activation. Walking into the light grants half soul heart and tears up until the floor ends
Same light appears in secret rooms, super secret rooms, and ultra secret rooms while held
Drops XIX - The Sun? on first activation
Burns one enemy in the room upon activation
Chance to spawn a ghost flame projectile at killed enemies' location while held
Chance increases with luck
Burning Basement floors will not appear in the next run
Drops XVIII - The Moon? on first activation
Darkens the room and creates a light at the center upon activation. Walking into the light grants half soul heart and tears up until the floor ends
Same light appears upon first entering treasure rooms, shops, and boss rooms while held
Spawns a ladder in the starting room of each new floor, leading to a special devil room
The ladder disappears after exiting the starting room
Revives with half heart upon death while held
Spawns 1 item not held from items encountered in this run upon activation
Single use
Fires needle shots dealing x3 Isaac's damage with low chance
Chance increases with luck
Needle shots instantly kill normal monsters and fire a 10-way needle ring
Familiar that drops one of hearts, coins, or keys with chance upon clearing a room, and a random trinket every 5 rooms
x1.5 damage multiplier
+0.5 tears while held
+2 tears in the room upon activation
Doubles most card effects and makes temporary card effects permanent
Drops 1 card on pickup
Adds 4 different items to each pedestal item in the room that switch rapidly
Fires a beam dealing x2 damage in Isaac's direction
Destroys all spiked rocks and blooms flowers on all rocks upon entering a room
Bloomed rocks are automatically destroyed upon clearing the room
Creates a pillar to a planetarium in the starting room every new floor
Pillar can be entered by consuming 30 coins and disappears upon leaving the starting room
Treasure rooms always contain IBN 5100
IBN 5100 rewinds time by consuming 10 coins, moving Isaac to the previous room and undoing all events in the activated room
Grants Soy Milk effect in rooms with enemies, increasing tears and greatly decreasing damage, tear size, and knockback
Doubles lucky pennies
Replaces all upright cards with reversed cards
Creates a triangular laser around Isaac that pierces enemies and deals rapid sustained damage
Holding bomb key while placing a bomb holds it in hand to throw in the Isaac's direction
Throws the Love letter in the direction of your choice
Upon striking an enemy, the Love Letter will instantly charm it and its copies during this run
Does not charm bosses and only deals minor damage to them
Can be thrown once per floor. Cannot be recharged through normal methods
NEED REPENTOGON
Chance to respawns all enemies when entering a cleared room
Spawn 4 Dip familiars
Deals instant damage to Poop-type enemies in the room
Once per floor upon taking damage, all enemies in the room freeze and a QTE event triggers
Success: Negates damage, bleeds nearby enemies, grants rapidly decaying damage and tears up for the room
Failure: Permanently decreases damage multiplier by a small amount
Chance when firing tears that have a holy aura that deals 60 damage per second
Chance increases with luck
Chance to spawn an additional red chest when one is spawned
Chance increases with luck
Chance to fire ice tears that slow enemies
Chance increases with luck
Enemies killed by ice tears become frozen solid, and can be pushed to shatter into a ring of additional ice tears
Prevent damage from curse room doors
Reveals curse rooms on the map
Defeating Mega Satan, Delirium, Mother, or Dogma spawns Eden's Blessing
This trinket disappeared after triggering
Chance to spawn a lil' battery each time you pick up a coin
Chance increases with luck
Gain an additional passive item on pickup
This trinket disappeared after triggering
Consumes the held trinket by spending 5 coins upon pickup and grants its effect as a permanent passive effect
After defeating the floor's boss, spawns 2 items of Wrath of the Lamb
This trinket disappeared after triggering
Immunity to floor curses
Increases chance of encountering angel rooms at the start of each new floor
Reveals the map up to 2 rooms away
Reveal the blind item
1 additional planetarium item will appear in treasure rooms
This trinket disappeared after triggering
Astro-rules only
This trinket has the same effect as Perfection
Prevents passive items from spawning
Consumes the held trinket at the start of each new floor and grants its effect as a permanent passive effect
Deals instant damage to all enemies in the room each time Isaac consumes a pill
Upon taking fatal damage, small chance to this item prevents death
Chance increases with luck
